00052     template <class InputIterator_>
00053     class iterator2stream
00054     {
00055         InputIterator_ current_, end_;
00056 
00058         iterator2stream() { };
00059     public:
00061         typedef typename std::iterator_traits<InputIterator_>::value_type value_type;
00062 
00063         iterator2stream(InputIterator_ begin, InputIterator_ end) :
00064             current_(begin), end_(end) { }
00065 
00066         iterator2stream(const iterator2stream & a) : current_(a.current_), end_(a.end_) { }
00067 
00069         const value_type & operator * () const
00070         {
00071             return *current_;
00072         }
00073 
00074         const value_type * operator -> () const
00075         {
00076             return &current_;
00077         }
00078 
00080         iterator2stream &  operator ++()
00081         {
00082             assert(end_ != current_);
00083             ++current_;
00084             return *this;
00085         }
00086 
00088         bool empty() const
00089         {
00090             return (current_ == end_);
00091         }
00092     };
00093

00099     template <class InputIterator_>
00100     iterator2stream<InputIterator_> streamify(InputIterator_ begin, InputIterator_ end)
00101     {
00102         return iterator2stream<InputIterator_>(begin, end);
00103     }
00104 
00106     template <class InputIterator_>
00107     struct streamify_traits
00108     {
00110         typedef iterator2stream<InputIterator_> stream_type;
00111     };

00117     template <class InputIterator_>
00118     class vector_iterator2stream
00119     {
00120         InputIterator_ current_, end_;
00121         typedef buf_istream < typename InputIterator_::block_type,
00122         typename InputIterator_::bids_container_iterator > buf_istream_type;
00123 
00124         mutable std::auto_ptr<buf_istream_type> in;
00125 
00127         vector_iterator2stream() { };
00128 
00129         void delete_stream()
00130         {
00131             in.reset();
00132         }
00133     public:
00134         typedef vector_iterator2stream<InputIterator_> Self_;
00135 
00137         typedef typename std::iterator_traits<InputIterator_>::value_type value_type;
00138 
00139         vector_iterator2stream(InputIterator_ begin, InputIterator_ end, unsigned_type nbuffers = 0) :
00140             current_(begin), end_(end), in(NULL)
00141         {
00142             begin.flush();     // flush container
00143             typename InputIterator_::bids_container_iterator end_iter = end.bid() + ((end.block_offset()) ? 1 : 0);
00144 
00145             if (end_iter - begin.bid() > 0)
00146             {
00147                 in.reset(new buf_istream_type(begin.bid(), end_iter, nbuffers ? nbuffers :
00148                                               (2 * config::get_instance()->disks_number())));
00149 
00150                 InputIterator_ cur = begin - begin.block_offset();
00151 
00152                 // skip the beginning of the block
00153                 for ( ; cur != begin; ++cur)
00154                     ++ (*in);
00155             }
00156         }
00157 
00158         vector_iterator2stream(const Self_ & a) : current_(a.current_), end_(a.end_), in(a.in) { }
00159 
00161         const value_type & operator * () const
00162         {
00163             return **in;
00164         }
00165 
00166         const value_type * operator -> () const
00167         {
00168             return &(**in);
00169         }
00170 
00172         Self_ &  operator ++()
00173         {
00174             assert(end_ != current_);
00175             ++current_;
00176             ++ (*in);
00177             if (empty())
00178                 delete_stream();
00179 
00180             return *this;
00181         }
00182 
00184         bool empty() const
00185         {
00186             return (current_ == end_);
00187         }
00188         virtual ~vector_iterator2stream()
00189         {
00190             delete_stream();      // not needed actually
00191         }
00192     };
00193

00202     template < typename Tp_, typename AllocStr_, typename SzTp_, typename DiffTp_,
00203               unsigned BlkSize_, typename PgTp_, unsigned PgSz_ >
00204     vector_iterator2stream<stxxl::vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_> >
00205     streamify(
00206         stxxl::vector_iterator < Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_ > begin,
00207         stxxl::vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_> end,
00208         unsigned_type nbuffers = 0)
00209     {
00210         STXXL_VERBOSE1("streamify for vector_iterator range is called");
00211         return vector_iterator2stream<stxxl::vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_> >
00212                (begin, end, nbuffers);
00213     }

00257     template <class InputIterator_>
00258     class vector_iterator2stream_sr
00259     {
00260         vector_iterator2stream<InputIterator_> *vec_it_stream;
00261         iterator2stream<InputIterator_> *it_stream;
00262 
00264         vector_iterator2stream_sr();
00265 
00266         typedef typename InputIterator_::block_type block_type;
00267     public:
00268         typedef vector_iterator2stream_sr<InputIterator_> Self_;
00269 
00271         typedef typename std::iterator_traits<InputIterator_>::value_type value_type;
00272 
00273         vector_iterator2stream_sr(InputIterator_ begin, InputIterator_ end, unsigned_type nbuffers = 0)
00274         {
00275             if (end - begin < block_type::size )
00276             {
00277                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("vector_iterator2stream_sr::vector_iterator2stream_sr: Choosing iterator2stream<InputIterator_>");
00278                 it_stream = new iterator2stream<InputIterator_>(begin, end);
00279                 vec_it_stream = NULL;
00280             }
00281             else
00282             {
00283                 STXXL_VERBOSE1("vector_iterator2stream_sr::vector_iterator2stream_sr: Choosing vector_iterator2stream<InputIterator_>");
00284                 it_stream = NULL;
00285                 vec_it_stream = new vector_iterator2stream<InputIterator_>(begin, end, nbuffers);
00286             }
00287         }
00288 
00289         vector_iterator2stream_sr(const Self_ & a) : vec_it_stream(a.vec_it_stream), it_stream(a.it_stream) { }
00290 
00292         const value_type & operator * () const
00293         {
00294             if (it_stream)
00295                 return **it_stream;
00296 
00297             return **vec_it_stream;
00298         }
00299 
00300         const value_type * operator -> () const
00301         {
00302             if (it_stream)
00303                 return &(**it_stream);
00304 
00305             return &(**vec_it_stream);
00306         }
00307 
00309         Self_ &  operator ++()
00310         {
00311             if (it_stream)
00312                 ++ (*it_stream);
00313 
00314             else
00315                 ++ (*vec_it_stream);
00316 
00317 
00318             return *this;
00319         }
00320 
00322         bool empty() const
00323         {
00324             if (it_stream)
00325                 return it_stream->empty();
00326 
00327             return vec_it_stream->empty();
00328         }
00329         virtual ~vector_iterator2stream_sr()
00330         {
00331             if (it_stream)
00332                 delete it_stream;
00333 
00334             else
00335                 delete vec_it_stream;
00336         }
00337     };

00373     template <class OutputIterator_, class StreamAlgorithm_>
00374     OutputIterator_ materialize(StreamAlgorithm_ & in, OutputIterator_ out)
00375     {
00376         while (!in.empty())
00377         {
00378             *out = *in;
00379             ++out;
00380             ++in;
00381         }
00382         return out;
00383     }
00384 
00385 
00395     template <class OutputIterator_, class StreamAlgorithm_>
00396     OutputIterator_ materialize(StreamAlgorithm_ & in, OutputIterator_ outbegin, OutputIterator_ outend)
00397     {
00398         while ((!in.empty()) && outend != outbegin)
00399         {
00400             *outbegin = *in;
00401             ++outbegin;
00402             ++in;
00403         }
00404         return outbegin;
00405     }
00406 
00407 
00419     template < typename Tp_, typename AllocStr_, typename SzTp_, typename DiffTp_,
00420               unsigned BlkSize_, typename PgTp_, unsigned PgSz_, class StreamAlgorithm_ >
00421     stxxl::vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_>
00422     materialize(StreamAlgorithm_ & in,
00423                 stxxl::vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_> outbegin,
00424                 stxxl::vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_> outend,
00425                 unsigned_type nbuffers = 0)
00426     {
00427         typedef stxxl::vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_>  ExtIterator;
00428         typedef stxxl::const_vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_> ConstExtIterator;
00429         typedef buf_ostream < typename ExtIterator::block_type, typename ExtIterator::bids_container_iterator > buf_ostream_type;
00430 
00431 
00432         while (outbegin.block_offset()) //  go to the beginning of the block
00433         //  of the external vector
00434         {
00435             if (in.empty() || outbegin == outend)
00436                 return outbegin;
00437 
00438             *outbegin = *in;
00439             ++outbegin;
00440             ++in;
00441         }
00442 
00443         if (nbuffers == 0)
00444             nbuffers = 2 * config::get_instance()->disks_number();
00445 
00446 
00447         outbegin.flush(); // flush container
00448 
00449         // create buffered write stream for blocks
00450         buf_ostream_type outstream(outbegin.bid(), nbuffers);
00451 
00452         assert(outbegin.block_offset() == 0);
00453 
00454         while (!in.empty() && outend != outbegin )
00455         {
00456             if (outbegin.block_offset() == 0 )
00457                 outbegin.touch();
00458 
00459             *outstream = *in;
00460             ++outbegin;
00461             ++outstream;
00462             ++in;
00463         }
00464 
00465         ConstExtIterator const_out = outbegin;
00466 
00467         while (const_out.block_offset()) // filling the rest of the block
00468         {
00469             *outstream = *const_out;
00470             ++const_out;
00471             ++outstream;
00472         }
00473         outbegin.flush();
00474 
00475         return outbegin;
00476     }
00477 
00478 
00487     template < typename Tp_, typename AllocStr_, typename SzTp_, typename DiffTp_,
00488               unsigned BlkSize_, typename PgTp_, unsigned PgSz_, class StreamAlgorithm_ >
00489     stxxl::vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_>
00490     materialize(StreamAlgorithm_ & in,
00491                 stxxl::vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_> out,
00492                 unsigned_type nbuffers = 0)
00493     {
00494         typedef stxxl::vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_>  ExtIterator;
00495         typedef stxxl::const_vector_iterator<Tp_, AllocStr_, SzTp_, DiffTp_, BlkSize_, PgTp_, PgSz_> ConstExtIterator;
00496         typedef buf_ostream < typename ExtIterator::block_type, typename ExtIterator::bids_container_iterator > buf_ostream_type;
00497 
00498         // on the I/O complexity of "materialize":
00499         // crossing block boundary causes O(1) I/Os
00500         // if you stay in a block, then materialize function accesses only the cache of the
00501         // vector (only one block indeed), amortized complexity should apply here
00502 
00503         while (out.block_offset()) //  go to the beginning of the block
00504         //  of the external vector
00505         {
00506             if (in.empty())
00507                 return out;
00508 
00509             *out = *in;
00510             ++out;
00511             ++in;
00512         }
00513 
00514         if (nbuffers == 0)
00515             nbuffers = 2 * config::get_instance()->disks_number();
00516 
00517 
00518         out.flush(); // flush container
00519 
00520         // create buffered write stream for blocks
00521         buf_ostream_type outstream(out.bid(), nbuffers);
00522 
00523         assert( out.block_offset() == 0 );
00524 
00525         while (!in.empty())
00526         {
00527             if (out.block_offset() == 0 )
00528                 out.touch();
00529             // tells the vector that the block was modified
00530             *outstream = *in;
00531             ++out;
00532             ++outstream;
00533             ++in;
00534         }
00535 
00536         ConstExtIterator const_out = out;
00537 
00538         while (const_out.block_offset())
00539         {
00540             *outstream = *const_out;      // might cause I/Os for loading the page that
00541             ++const_out;                         // contains data beyond out
00542             ++outstream;
00543         }
00544         out.flush();
00545 
00546         return out;
00547     }
00548

00554     template <class Generator_>
00555     class generator2stream
00556     {
00557     public:
00559         typedef typename Generator_::value_type value_type;
00560     private:
00561         Generator_ gen_;
00562         value_type current_;
00563 
00565         generator2stream() { };
00566     public:
00567 
00568         generator2stream(Generator_ g) :
00569             gen_(g), current_(gen_()) { }
00570 
00571         generator2stream(const generator2stream & a) : gen_(a.gen_), current_(a.current_) { }
00572 
00574         const value_type & operator * () const
00575         {
00576             return current_;
00577         }
00578 
00579         const value_type * operator -> () const
00580         {
00581             return &current_;
00582         }
00583 
00585         generator2stream &  operator ++()
00586         {
00587             current_ = gen_();
00588             return *this;
00589         }
00590 
00592         bool empty() const
00593         {
00594             return false;
00595         }
00596     };
00597 
00601     template <class Generator_>
00602     generator2stream<Generator_> streamify(Generator_ gen_)
00603     {
00604         return generator2stream<Generator_>(gen_);
00605     }

00607     struct Stopper {};
00608 
00620     template <class Operation_, class Input1_,
00621               class Input2_ = Stopper,
00622               class Input3_ = Stopper,
00623               class Input4_ = Stopper,
00624               class Input5_ = Stopper,
00625               class Input6_ = Stopper
00626     >
00627     class transform
00628     {
00629         Operation_ op;
00630         Input1_ &i1;
00631         Input2_ &i2;
00632         Input3_ &i3;
00633         Input4_ &i4;
00634         Input5_ &i5;
00635         Input6_ &i6;
00636     public:
00638         typedef typename Operation_::value_type value_type;
00639 
00640     private:
00641         value_type current;
00642     public:
00643 
00645         transform(Operation_ o, Input1_ & i1_, Input2_ & i2_, Input3_ & i3_, Input4_ & i4_,
00646                   Input5_ & i5_, Input5_ & i6_) :
00647             op(o), i1(i1_), i2(i2_), i3(i3_), i4(i4_), i5(i5_), i6(i6_),
00648             current(op(*i1, *i2, *i3, *i4, *i5, *i6)) { }
00649 
00651         const value_type & operator * () const
00652         {
00653             return current;
00654         }
00655 
00656         const value_type * operator -> () const
00657         {
00658             return &current;
00659         }
00660 
00662         transform &  operator ++()
00663         {
00664             ++i1;
00665             ++i2;
00666             ++i3;
00667             ++i4;
00668             ++i5;
00669             ++i6;
00670 
00671             if (!empty())
00672                 current = op(*i1, *i2, *i3, *i4, *i5, *i6);
00673 
00674 
00675             return *this;
00676         }
00677 
00679         bool empty() const
00680         {
00681             return i1.empty() || i2.empty() || i3.empty() ||
00682                    i4.empty() || i5.empty() || i6.empty();
00683         }
00684     };
00685 
00686     // Specializations
00687 
00695     template <class Operation_, class Input1_ >
00696     class transform<Operation_, Input1_, Stopper, Stopper, Stopper, Stopper, Stopper>
00697     {
00698         Operation_ op;
00699         Input1_ &i1;
00700     public:
00702         typedef typename Operation_::value_type value_type;
00703 
00704     private:
00705         value_type current;
00706     public:
00707 
00709         transform(Operation_ o, Input1_ & i1_) : op(o), i1(i1_),
00710                                                  current(op(*i1)) { }
00711 
00713         const value_type & operator * () const
00714         {
00715             return current;
00716         }
00717 
00718         const value_type * operator -> () const
00719         {
00720             return &current;
00721         }
00722 
00724         transform &  operator ++()
00725         {
00726             ++i1;
00727             if (!empty())
00728                 current = op(*i1);
00729 
00730 
00731             return *this;
00732         }
00733 
00735         bool empty() const
00736         {
00737             return i1.empty();
00738         }
00739     };

00750     template <class Operation_, class Input1_,
00751               class Input2_
00752     >
00753     class transform<Operation_, Input1_, Input2_, Stopper, Stopper, Stopper, Stopper>
00754     {
00755         Operation_ op;
00756         Input1_ &i1;
00757         Input2_ &i2;
00758     public:
00760         typedef typename Operation_::value_type value_type;
00761 
00762     private:
00763         value_type current;
00764     public:
00765 
00767         transform(Operation_ o, Input1_ & i1_, Input2_ & i2_) : op(o), i1(i1_), i2(i2_),
00768                                                                 current(op(*i1, *i2)) { }
00769 
00771         const value_type & operator * () const
00772         {
00773             return current;
00774         }
00775 
00776         const value_type * operator -> () const
00777         {
00778             return &current;
00779         }
00780 
00782         transform &  operator ++()
00783         {
00784             ++i1;
00785             ++i2;
00786             if (!empty())
00787                 current = op(*i1, *i2);
00788 
00789 
00790             return *this;
00791         }
00792 
00794         bool empty() const
00795         {
00796             return i1.empty() || i2.empty();
00797         }
00798     };

00810     template <class Operation_, class Input1_,
00811               class Input2_,
00812               class Input3_
00813     >
00814     class transform<Operation_, Input1_, Input2_, Input3_, Stopper, Stopper, Stopper>
00815     {
00816         Operation_ op;
00817         Input1_ &i1;
00818         Input2_ &i2;
00819         Input3_ &i3;
00820     public:
00822         typedef typename Operation_::value_type value_type;
00823 
00824     private:
00825         value_type current;
00826     public:
00827 
00829         transform(Operation_ o, Input1_ & i1_, Input2_ & i2_, Input3_ & i3_) :
00830             op(o), i1(i1_), i2(i2_), i3(i3_),
00831             current(op(*i1, *i2, *i3)) { }
00832 
00834         const value_type & operator * () const
00835         {
00836             return current;
00837         }
00838 
00839         const value_type * operator -> () const
00840         {
00841             return &current;
00842         }
00843 
00845         transform &  operator ++()
00846         {
00847             ++i1;
00848             ++i2;
00849             ++i3;
00850             if (!empty())
00851                 current = op(*i1, *i2, *i3);
00852 
00853 
00854             return *this;
00855         }
00856 
00858         bool empty() const
00859         {
00860             return i1.empty() || i2.empty() || i3.empty();
00861         }
00862     };

00875     template <class Operation_, class Input1_,
00876               class Input2_,
00877               class Input3_,
00878               class Input4_
00879     >
00880     class transform<Operation_, Input1_, Input2_, Input3_, Input4_, Stopper, Stopper>
00881     {
00882         Operation_ op;
00883         Input1_ &i1;
00884         Input2_ &i2;
00885         Input3_ &i3;
00886         Input4_ &i4;
00887     public:
00889         typedef typename Operation_::value_type value_type;
00890 
00891     private:
00892         value_type current;
00893     public:
00894 
00896         transform(Operation_ o, Input1_ & i1_, Input2_ & i2_, Input3_ & i3_, Input4_ & i4_) :
00897             op(o), i1(i1_), i2(i2_), i3(i3_), i4(i4_),
00898             current(op(*i1, *i2, *i3, *i4)) { }
00899 
00901         const value_type & operator * () const
00902         {
00903             return current;
00904         }
00905 
00906         const value_type * operator -> () const
00907         {
00908             return &current;
00909         }
00910 
00912         transform &  operator ++()
00913         {
00914             ++i1;
00915             ++i2;
00916             ++i3;
00917             ++i4;
00918             if (!empty())
00919                 current = op(*i1, *i2, *i3, *i4);
00920 
00921 
00922             return *this;
00923         }
00924 
00926         bool empty() const
00927         {
00928             return i1.empty() || i2.empty() || i3.empty() || i4.empty();
00929         }
00930     };

01025         Input2_ &i2;
01026         Input3_ &i3;
01027         Input4_ &i4;
01028         Input5_ &i5;
01029         Input6_ &i6;

01036         typename Input3_::value_type,
01037         typename Input4_::value_type,
01038         typename Input5_::value_type,
01039         typename Input6_::value_type
01040         > value_type;
01041 
01042     private:
01043         value_type current;
01044     public:
01045 
01047         make_tuple(
01048             Input1_ & i1_,
01049             Input2_ & i2_,
01050             Input3_ & i3_,
01051             Input4_ & i4_,
01052             Input5_ & i5_,
01053             Input6_ & i6_
01054         ) :
01055             i1(i1_), i2(i2_), i3(i3_), i4(i4_), i5(i5_), i6(i6_),
01056             current(value_type(*i1, *i2, *i3, *i4, *i5, *i6)) { }
01057 
01059         const value_type & operator * () const
01060         {
01061             return current;
01062         }
01063 
01064         const value_type * operator -> () const
01065         {
01066             return &current;
01067         }

01071         {

01074             ++i3;
01075             ++i4;
01076             ++i5;
01077             ++i6;
01078 
01079             if (!empty())
01080                 current = value_type(*i1, *i2, *i3, *i4, *i5, *i6);
01081 
01082 
01083             return *this;
01084         }
01085 
01087         bool empty() const
01088         {
01089             return i1.empty() || i2.empty() || i3.empty() ||
01090                    i4.empty() || i5.empty() || i6.empty();
01091         }
01092     };

01103     >
01104     class make_tuple<Input1_, Input2_, Stopper, Stopper, Stopper, Stopper>
01105     {
01106         Input1_ &i1;
01107         Input2_ &i2;
01108 
01109     public:
01111         typedef typename stxxl::tuple <
01112         typename Input1_::value_type,
01113         typename Input2_::value_type
01114         > value_type;
01115 
01116     private:
01117         value_type current;
01118     public:
01119 
01121         make_tuple(
01122             Input1_ & i1_,
01123             Input2_ & i2_
01124         ) :
01125             i1(i1_), i2(i2_)
01126         {
01127             if (!empty())
01128             {
01129                 current = value_type(*i1, *i2);
01130             }
01131         }
01132 
01134         const value_type & operator * () const
01135         {
01136             return current;
01137         }
01138 
01139         const value_type * operator -> () const
01140         {
01141             return &current;
01142         }
01143

01146         {
01147             ++i1;
01148             ++i2;
01149 
01150             if (!empty())
01151                 current = value_type(*i1, *i2);
01152 
01153 
01154             return *this;
01155         }
01156 
01158         bool empty() const
01159         {
01160             return i1.empty() || i2.empty();
01161         }
01162     };

01398     { };

01406     template <class Input_>
01407     class choose < Input_, 1 >
01408     {
01409         Input_ &in;
01410 
01411         typedef typename Input_::value_type tuple_type;
01412     public:
01413 
01415         typedef typename tuple_type::first_type value_type;
01416 
01417     private:
01418         value_type current;
01419     public:
01420 
01422         choose( Input_ & in_) :
01423             in(in_),
01424             current((*in_).first) { }
01425 
01427         const value_type & operator * () const
01428         {
01429             return current;
01430         }
01431 
01432         const value_type * operator -> () const
01433         {
01434             return &current;
01435         }
01436 
01438         choose &  operator ++()
01439         {
01440             ++in;
01441 
01442             if (!empty())
01443                 current = (*in).first;
01444 
01445 
01446             return *this;
01447         }
01448 
01450         bool empty() const
01451         {
01452             return in.empty();
01453         }
01454     };

01735 
01740     template <class Input, class BinaryPredicate = Stopper>
01741     class unique
01742     {
01743         Input &input;
01744         BinaryPredicate binary_pred;
01745         typename Input::value_type current;
01746         unique();
01747     public:
01748         typedef typename Input::value_type value_type;
01749         unique(Input & input_, BinaryPredicate binary_pred_) : input(input_), binary_pred(binary_pred_)
01750         {
01751             if (!input.empty())
01752                 current = *input;
01753         }
01754 
01756         unique & operator ++ ()
01757         {
01758             value_type old_value = current;
01759             ++input;
01760             while (!input.empty() && (binary_pred(current = *input, old_value)) )
01761                 ++input;
01762         }
01764         const value_type operator * () const { return current; }
01766         const value_type * operator -> () const
01767         {
01768             return &current;
01769         }
01770 
01772         bool empty() const { return input.empty(); }
01773     };
01774 
01778     template <class Input>
01779     class unique<Input, Stopper>
01780     {
01781         Input &input;
01782         typename Input::value_type current;
01783         unique();
01784     public:
01785         typedef typename Input::value_type value_type;
01786         unique(Input & input_) : input(input_)
01787         {
01788             if (!input.empty())
01789                 current = *input;
01790         }
01792         unique & operator ++ ()
01793         {
01794             value_type old_value = current;
01795             ++input;
01796             while (!input.empty() && ((current = *input) == old_value))
01797                 ++input;
01798         }
01800         value_type operator * () const { return current; }
01801 
01803         const value_type * operator -> () const
01804         {
01805             return &current;
01806         }
01807 
01809         bool empty() const { return input.empty(); }
01810     };
01811 
01812 
01814 }
